title: Experiment
description: Describes the experiment during which this Image was acquired. The optional Description element may contain free text to further describe the experiment.

subCategoriesOrder.Experiment: Describes the experiment during which this Image was acquired. The optional Description element may contain free text to further describe the experiment.
subCategoriesOrder.Experimenter: This empty element refers to Experimenter that performed this experiment.
subCategoriesOrder.Sample: A description of the sample that was imaged in this experiment.
subCategoriesOrder.MicrobeamManipulation: Defines a microbeam operation and the region of the image it was applied to. The LightSourceSettingsRef element is a reference to the LightSourceSettings that were used in this case including a reference to the light source that was used for this micromanipulation experiment (e.g.  a laser used for photobleaching).

Name.description: A user assigned name for this Experiment.

ID.description: A unique identifier for this Experiment.

Type.description: A term to describe the type of imaging experiment performed in this case.

LabellingMethod.description: A term that describes the method used for labelling the molecular component under study in this experiment.

items.description: This empty element refers to Experimenter that performed this experiment.

Sample.description: A description of the sample that was imaged in this experiment.

ID.description: A unique identifier for this Sample.

Name.description: A user assigned name for this Sample.

MountingMedium.description: The mounting medium the sample is embedded in during acquisition.

MountingMediumRefractiveIndex.description: The refractive index (RI) of the mounting medium. If possible the RI should be measured. Alternatively, please refer to the nominal RI as provided by the manufacturer.
